                                                                                 /*Code by fearless_coder*/
#include<stdio.h>
int main()
{
	long long int t,n,x,y,i,ans;
	scanf("%lld",&t);
	scanf("%lld",&n);
	while(t--)
	{
	ans=1;
	scanf("%lld%lld",&x,&y);
	for(i=0;i<y;i++)
	{
		ans=(ans*x)%n;
	}
	printf("%lld\n",ans);
	}
	return 0;
}
